title: DisguiseCraft不能变成怪物
author: 梦幻龙族Ⅱ
txt_content:
本帖最后由 梦幻龙族Ⅱ 于 2013-9-17 23:12 编辑 

插件加载时提示这个2013-09-17 22:29:37 [INFO] [DisguiseCraft] Enabling DisguiseCraft v4.8
2013-09-17 22:29:38 [WARNING] [DisguiseCraft] The following mobs are not present in this MineCraft version: Bat, Blaze, CaveSpider, Chicken, Cow, Creeper, EnderDragon, Enderman, Ghast, Giant, IronGolem, MagmaCube, MushroomCow, Ocelot, Pig, PigZombie, Sheep, Silverfish, Skeleton, Slime, Snowman, Spider, Squid, Villager, Witch, Wither, Wolf, Zombie
2013-09-17 22:29:38 [INFO] [DisguiseCraft] Version 4.8 is enabled!复制代码已安装ProtocolLib
现在只能变方块，不能变怪物。
服务端程序:mcpc-plus-1.5.2-R1.1-forge738-B643.jar

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: 插件版本和服务器端版本不符

replies.author: mayier318
replies.txt_content: 我也一样，好像是因为不太支持MCPC
